ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This course provides a solid introduction to environmental history, as well as Latin American history. It is an especially great option for students forming doing fields in environmental history.
Unlike other courses, this course affords students considerable latitude, which makes it appealing for those of us balancing multiple commitments.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course provided me with ideas for forming reading lists in my fields as well as contextualizing my own work as part of environmental history (which I had not considered before!).
This course provided me with a detailed reading list of the major works on the environmental history of Latin America and the Caribbean, which will be useful for teaching purposes.
